attributes.action: Re-introduce the death penalty for those who murder children, directly or via abuse.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Re-instate Capital Punishment for those who murder children either deliberately, or via long-term abuse and neglect.
Recent polls have shown that the majority of UK citizens would welcome the re-introduction of the Death Penalty, irrespective of what the Human Rights Acts may say on the subject, and also irrespective of what politicians actually vote for. The politicians should be voting on the majority and not on their own beliefs.
Innocent children should never be allowed to be abused and tortured to death and those who committ such crimes should be executed without exception.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
